content.question: In the first paragraph, the author is mainly concerned with

choices.label: distinguishing between two frames of reference
establishing his own credentials as a thinker
presenting a personal account of pragmatism
describing two sharply different points of view

content.answer: distinguishing between two frames of reference

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe the line of reasoning and explain whether it supports an argument's overarching thesis.
